H

hash - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.HashCollisions
Primary hash class, managing the other hash classes
Hash - Class in AlgorithmCode
This is the main entry point into the algorithm's structure, initiates truth table generation and manages the other Hash*** classes
Hash() - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Sets the helper classes and initiates generating the 32 basic codeword tables
hashArray(int[][], int, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class AlgorithmCode.HashTwoD
Hashes 2D data with the given parameters, hash-in-place version
hashArray(int[], int) - Method in class AlgorithmCode.HashOneD
1D version of the hash algorithm using all 32 codeword sets, hash-in-place
hashArray(int[], int, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class AlgorithmCode.HashOneD
1D version of the hash algorithm using only a single codeword set, hash-in-place version
hashArrayCompression(int[][], int, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class AlgorithmCode.HashTwoD
Hashes a 2D array of hexadecimal data with the given parameters, compression version
hashArrayCompression(int[], int, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class AlgorithmCode.HashOneD
1D version of the hash algorithm, single codeword set and compression version
hashBitmap(String, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class AlgorithmCode.HashTwoD
Loads a bitmap, eca hash transforms it, displays it, makes a .gif file using the given parameters
hashCollisions - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Generally tests the hash algorithm for collisions and uniqueness
HashCollisions - Class in AlgorithmCode
The HashCollisions class is designed to analyze and verify various properties of codeword mappings, particularly focused on identifying and evaluating hash collisions within 4x4 neighborhoods.
HashCollisions(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashCollisions
Sets the manager function
hashColumns - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Generates the codeword set truth tables as well as some minor functions, this one is set to columnError weighted errorScores
hashLogicOpTransform - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
The relative logic gate transform that occurs when hashing
HashLogicOpTransform - Class in AlgorithmCode
This class produces and verifies truth tables of logic gate transformation when hashed.
HashLogicOpTransform(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashLogicOpTransform
Loads the manager class
HashOneD - Class in AlgorithmCode
One D version of the hash algorithm
HashOneD(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashOneD
Sets the algorithm parent
hashRows - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Generates the codeword set truth tables as well as some minor functions, this one is set to rowError weighted errorScores
hashRowsColumns - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Both hashRows and hashColumns in one array
HashTruthTables - Class in AlgorithmCode
Generates, tests, and displays sets of hash codeword truth tables, where the table is addressed by a binary input neighborhood, and it's value is a hexadecimal codeword ECA rule pair together that minimize the discrepancies between the input and the ECA output using the codeword as the initial value
HashTruthTables(boolean, Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashTruthTables
Initializes everything to size 4, so truth tables are 65536 long.
HashTwoD - Class in AlgorithmCode
Contains hash functions for 2D arrays/bitmap hashing, inversions, and testing
HashTwoD(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashTwoD
Sets the Hash manager function
height - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.AnimatedGifEncoder
